name: Serene Innovations TV-SB Wireless Stereo Hi-Fidelity Speaker w/ Flexible Voice Enhancing Technology

reviews.name: Serene Innovations TV-SB Wireless Stereo Hi-Fidelity Speaker w/ Flexible Voice Enhancing Technology
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for something that would help me hear, and also, understand the wors being spoken, I can use it with or without the earphones. I had a little trouble getting the sound for my streaming channels . But it's all in the know how to hook it up . It's a great speaker , thanks KD
reviews.title: Marvelous

reviews.name: Serene Innovations TV-SB Wireless Stereo Hi-Fidelity Speaker w/ Flexible Voice Enhancing Technology
reviews.reviewText:
How often does an online purchase exceed your expectations? I'm guessing 0 to 2%?
This, for the hard of hearing, is perfect.
Very easy to set up also.
I think I will buy another one to avoid carrying it from room to room.
.
reviews.title: Very pleased.

reviews.name: Serene Innovations TV-SB Wireless Stereo Hi-Fidelity Speaker w/ Flexible Voice Enhancing Technology
reviews.reviewText: My husband is hard of hearing and this works perfect for him. It was easy to install love it.
reviews.title: wonderful tv speaker

reviews.name: Serene Innovations TV-SB Wireless Stereo Hi-Fidelity Speaker w/ Flexible Voice Enhancing Technology
reviews.reviewText: After years of looking for something to move the TV sound closer and make voices more distinct at a price a working person can afford Serene Innovations has come through. We no longer fight over the volume control on the remote. It has everything I need in a nice looking retro package. Worked first time right out of the box and took only a minute to hook up. I added a separate power supply so now the speaker never leaves my table. Fixing to add an additional speaker for a truly custom TV sound system at a price everyone can afford. Where were you guys 10 years ago?
reviews.title: Finally, a way to hear the TV!

reviews.name: Serene Innovations TV-SB Wireless Stereo Hi-Fidelity Speaker w/ Flexible Voice Enhancing Technology
reviews.reviewText:
We have cable TV service and can not hear recorded programs. No amount of adjusting by the server could fix this problem.
Thanks to this product we can finally hear every word and sound.
So pleased with this product I purchased a second speaker for my music system.
reviews.title: Can you hear me now - Yes, thanks to SITVWS
